name: Requirements and Specification Engineer (RSE)
description:
YADRO is a group of Russian technology companies that combines the areas of development and computing platforms, data processing and storage systems, telecommunications and network equipment.

YADRO research and development centers are located in Moscow, St. Petersburg and Nizhny Novgorod, in the near future it is planned to open an office in Minsk. The production site is located in the Moscow region and a full-cycle plant is being built. Now we already have more than 2200 people, and we continue to actively grow and expand the team.

We are looking for an inspired software architect to be a part of our Algorithms, Architecture and Specification team.

Responsibility is to create and maintain effective 4G base station SW architecture and design as part of the team. Focus area are some or all of the following sub-domains depending on skills:

What will you do:

  • Develop requirements for 4G Base Station as a product and as a solution
  • Develop requirements for subsystems and their interfaces with other components
  • Develop specifications of 4G implementation components
  • Perform technical analysis and refinement of 4G features
  • Lead certain requirements/specification competence area(s)
  • Ensure consistency of feature implementations with other teams
  • Specify current customer expectations to products and solutions for 4G base station
  • Consult development teams in features implementation
  • Create feature and test specifications for a product release
  • Investigate and correct requirements and specification defects and related complex customer problems
  • Align requirements and specifications to 3GPP updates

What do we expect from a future team member:

  • Master or above in telecommunication, electronic engineering, computer science, or related
  • General knowledge of LTE/5G
  • Deep knowledge of and first-hand experience (requirements, modeling, implementation, profiling, testing or deployment) with some particular LTE/5G layer or component
  • 3+ years of background on development/research/specification of wireless/telecom/radar systems
  • Verbal communication and fluent writing skills in English and Russian languages
  • Proactive and independent problem solving through own experience and network
  • Strong communication skills and the ability to work in distributed teams

Preferred skills:

  • Experiences on programming in Python/Matlab/C/C++ and modeling wireless communications systems
  • Embedded systems, ARM, DSP, ASIC, FPGA etc. SW development expertise
  • Background in SW architecture/specification work for telecom/radar/wireless (embedded systems, ARM, DSP, ASIC, FPGA etc.) and/or signal processing SW development
  • Understanding of the ASIC/FPGA or DSP/low level SW design flow and process
  • Strong background in communications theory and signal processing

We will be glad to offer you:

  • Nice salary + juicy incentive bonuses
  • Health care insurance for you and supported VMI for your family members; sports events, employee support program: psychological, legal and healthy lifestyle consultations with external specialists
  • Remote or hybrid work format: remote work from home on a corporate laptop from any location s, and the opportunity to visit a comfortable office in Minsk
  • Employee training and development programs
  • Internal Innovation Support Program
  • Award system for scientific achievements, publication of articles and registration of patents
  • "Lecture hall", where invited experts and our specialists share their professional experience from various fields of science
